Name: Cold Comfort
Ingredients: 22.5 ml Honey syrup (3 parts honey to 1 water by weight)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill an Old-fashioned glass .
Prepare garnish of lime wedge or slice wheel.
Review: Take at the first sign of a cold, and then retreat under your bed covers. Repeat dose regularly while symptoms persist. Warning - do not consume with other forms of medication.
Nutrition: One serving of Cold Comfort contains 158 calories
